short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple mindfulness extension for Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never forget to be mindful again. This simple chrome extension keeps you accountable and makes it easy to meditate daily, even if it is for just 2 minutes a day.
